entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 2:06 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: W 37 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
